name: Collectif Innovation
goal:
- Put "innovation" at the center of political debates.
- Bring a continu information flow to our members
- Develop a "virtual research center" on innovation policies.
Therefore,
- Use the communication systems of our members to inform their members on innovation.
- Encourage presidential or local candidates to use innovation policy as an argument.
- Organize cross-border research on innovation policies.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy
euInitiatives: - call for ideas for the European Innovation Council
